pull.title: Remove state arg from ReconsiderBlock, rename to ResetBlockFailureFlags
pull.body: It's never accessed or modified, and is needlessly checked for validity in the rpc command.

events.body:
Possibly ReconsiderBlock should be renamed ResetBlockFlags or something?

It doesn't actually reconsider the block.

events.message: Rename ReconsiderBlock func to reflect real behavior

rename.to: Remove state arg from ReconsiderBlock, rename to ResetBlockFailureFlags
